1.content:
It was not a typical day for young Christian Hanson. The 21-year-old physics student was in the middle of the summer break before his last semester of college. Taking a break from hitting the bars with his buddies and spending time with his lovely girlfriend, Angela, Christian was working hard on his latest invention.

The 21-year-old had created a type of shrink ray. This machine could perfectly reduce a living or non-living organism to miniscule size. It was programable which meant all Christian had to do was enter a number on the keypad, select the radius for shrinkage, and it should work perfectly.

There was only one issue Christian had noticed from testing it on lab rats the last few days. The device only worked on females. Christian believed this was because the Y-chromosome possessed by males of the species would block out and cancel the effect's of the device. Walking over the a cage containing two white rats, one male and one female.

"Alright, ready to test this out," Christian said, adjusting the controls of the device. He set it to one centimeter, and selected the radius as his house. "And three....two...one," he said and pressed the button on the device. Instantly, he watched as the female rat shrank down to one millimeter in height. Christian's jaw dropped as the male rat walked over and sniffed her, before the brutally biting into her and swallowing her.

"Fuck, still can't get it to work on both sexes," me muttered.

Christian proceeded to edit the device a little more. Thinking he was home alone, he adjusted the setting and pulled the trigger. There was only one problem.

Unaware of what Christian was doing in his room, a woman entered the house. When Christian pulled the trigger to the device, the woman screamed, and dwindled down to....
1.title: A new device....working?

11.content:
Christian sat up in his room, completely unaware that he had reduced a woman he knew to six inches tall.

Meanwhile, the woman screamed. She had been reduced to the size of a Barbie Doll with no warning at all. The tiny woman who had been shrunken down was....
11.title: 6 inches tall

choices: He takes her to the lab to fix her
111.content:
Carrie was just coming home from a long day of work, she saw her son fiddling with some sort of gadget but before she knew it, a beam of light zapped her and now she was six inches tall.

"What the hell?! Why am I so small!?" Carrie then looked up in fear and saw that her 22 year old son was now gigantic to her. "Oh my God! Christian's huge!"

Christian heard his ray go off and tried to look around.

"Hello? Anyone there?" He moved forward and Carrie tried to run for dear life.

"HELP! CHRISTIAN! IT'S MOM!! YOU SHRUNK ME!" As Christian was about to step on his teensy mother he heard a loud scream from below.

"What the? Oh no!" Christian knew what had happened, he quickly snatched Carrie and brought her up to his face.

"Holy shit! Mom! You shrunk!"

"Young man, you are in serious trouble. Make me big again right now." Christian scratched his head as he looked at the tiny woman in his hand.

"I'm sorry Mom, I don't know how?"

"Don't know how?! Why would you make a shrink ray without figuring out how to reverse it?!"

"Gee Mom, calm down, I said I was sorry."

"You can't be sorry! I'm doll sized. Christian you need to fix me right now!"

Christian's ears hurt as his tiny mom screamed at him. For such a small person she emitted a lot of noise.

What does Christian decide to do?
111.title: Oops I shrunk my Mom

1113.content:
"You know what, Mom? I don't like your tone."

"My tone? How would you be if your son shrunk you?"

Christian laughed as he dangled his Mom upside down.

"You shouldn't talk to me like that, Mom." Carrie screamed as her Godzilla sized son gave her vertigo.

"Let me go! Let me go!" Screamed the tiny Mom.

"All right."

He dropped his mother to the ground, causing her to scream in fear, but just as she was about to reach the ground, her son caught her.

"Gotcha, didn't I?" He said with a laugh.

"Yeah almost dying is hilarious." Carrie said dusting off her pants.

"Well, Mom, since you're gonna be a tiny little bitch. I think I'll just leave you at home for a while." With that he set the six inch MILF onto the coffee table, grabbed his shrink ray and left the house.

"Where are you going young man?! You can't just leave me here!"

"Oh yes I can, I've got some testing to do. Just sit tight, I'll try and help you when I feel like it. Enjoy your new size Mom. Toodles."

"Christian! Don't you dare!" With that Christian closed the door and left the building. Leaving Carrie six inches tall and home alone.
1113.title: Sorry Mom

11131.content:
Carrie huffs and sits down on the coffee table as she watches her son leave her there alone. she wants to get up and leave but the table is too far down for her to jump. She just sits there and waits for something or someone to come home and help her. She loves her family and her family loves her, they would be willing to help her if they see her at this size right?

Carrie sits there for what feels like a couple of hours just eating for someone to walk in that door and help her. Her mind starts to wander as she waits. She has to admit that part of her is actually enjoying this new size and wants to explore the house with it but she knows that it wouldn't be safe, because of her size she was scared that if she jumped to the floor someone may walk in and step on her with out realising.

"Christian better return home and change me back to normal." She sighs. "I dont' want to be a barbie forever."

Carrie's heart skips a beat as she hears the front door click and slowly swing open. She jumps up hopping to her the giants attention. Carrie stood up as high as her six inch form would allow her and looks to see who had just walked in.
11131.title: Stay with Carrie

111315.content:
Carrie sighs as she sits all alone, her stomach drops as she hears someone walk in. She looks up and sees...

1) Jack, the sixteen year old neighbour who is very shy and has a bit of a crush on Carrie.
2) Sophie, twelve years old and is over because Carrie agreed to look after her friends daughter.
3) Kelly, forty eight and is Carrie's friend
4) Donna, a elderly neighbour who has come over to borrow some flour

11132.content:
Christian had his shrink ray in hand and knew that he had the ability to do whatever he wanted with it.

"This is gonna be fun to use. I gotta be careful though. What am I gonna do?"

He thought about maybe showing it to his hot neighbor Mallorie. She'd probably find it interesting.

There were also a group of girl scouts all enjoying ice cream. There were many possibilities there.

Or he could even show it to Angela, his girlfriend, she might appreciate its abilities too.

So with some pondering, Christian decides to...

Chris gets the tiny swimsuit clad girls?
111322.content:
Emily, Julie, Tina, Yuna, Deka, Salina, Wendy, and Sara walk into a dressing room so they could go swimming. After they change into their swimsuits, the girls walk to the swimming pool area and see that the place is packed with swimmers. Annoyed, Julie the leader of Troop 17 says, “Well this sucks, let’s go to a secluded place I know nearby and get a tan. Maybe the pool will empty after a while.” Following their leader, the troop walks over to a seclude spot near some trees, they lay down their towels, and rest on them. As the girls feel the warm sunlight on their smooth bare skin, all of the girls begin to feel a bit strange, and a bit lightheaded.


Christian, Chris for short walks around the park deciding whom to shrink first, when he finally decides on an interesting nearby target. Chris sees some eye-catching uniformed girl scouts finishing their ice cream and entering a changing room next to a heavily crowded swimming pool. The girls are mostly white looking, and they appear to be between the ages of 18 to 21 years old. Chris watches both of the doors to the changing room for a few minutes and sees the girls finally emerging dressed in various colored swimsuits.

Chris follows them as they move away from the crowded pool area towards a more secluded area close by. He watches as the girls lay down some large beach towels near a tree. He watches as the girl’s rub suntan oil all over their smooth skin and lay down on the towels face down. Chris grins and fires the device at the girls quickly reducing them all to the size of Polly Pocket dolls, about three inches tall, bathing suits too but curiously not their towels. Chris hypothesized that anything worn close to their skin will shrink with them, but nothing close by like their towels will shrink.


Emily, Julie, Tina, Wendy, and Sara are White with varying lengths and colors of hair. Salina is of Hispanic heritage, Deka is of African ancestry, and Yuna of Japanese ancestry.

112.content:
Lauren was not having a good day.

The class she was taking on Tort Law was kicking her ass. And there was so much memorization involved that she had taken a hiatus on getting hammered and getting laid for the summer. And neither her body nor her friends (especially the friends with benefits) were appreciating that.

Still, her education was the most important thing to her, so she just pushed on.

When Lauren got home, the house was quiet. Her Mom was gone for a few days on some business thing, her sister was on a trip with friends and her brother had locked himself in his bedroom, working on some kind of new invention, only coming out for meals and bathroom breaks. So for all intents and purposes, Lauren had the house to herself.

Lauren had grabbed herself a water from the refrigerator and was heading to her room when it happened. One moment, she was full sized, the next she was six inches tall. And, oh yeah,
112.title: Lauren

113.content:
"I am the greatest!" Julia singsang as she walked into the house, wearing her soccer uniform. It was dirty, grass stained and even had a drop or two of her own blood on it, but Julia was still feeling exhilarated. She had dominated the game today, and had been carried off the field on the shoulders of her celebrating teammates.

Julia was a little disappointed her Mom and older sister weren't there, but she understood why they couldn't be. Julia's Mom was gone for the week on a business trip, and Lauren was doing the Paper Chase thing all weekend

Julia was a lot disappointed that Christian hadn't shown up to watch. He could have taken a break from whatever he was tinkering on to come watch her. She knew Christian would get lost in whatever he was working on, but would it have really been that much of a bother to come up for hair this afternoon to come watch her play?

(Before we continue this story, did Julia come home alone, or with a friend/friends?)

"You...were...AWESOME" Vanessa enthused as she followed Julia into the house.

[[Vanessa is an eighteen year old student and teammate on Julia's soccer room and Julia's best friend. She is a bit shy around boys but has a bubbly and free spirit. "You have the house to yourself this weekend?" Vanessa asked as Julia grabbed two premade smoothies from the refrigerator.

"Just Christian, which is pretty much like having the house to myself," Julia said in a neutral tone. Vanessa just gave a noncommittal "Ah." She knew Christian not showing up for Julia's game had hurt Julia, and the other girl didn't want other people to know how much it had hurt her. Vanessa only knew because she and Julia had been friends since third grade, and Vanessa knew all of Julia's emotional "tells."

"So, if I have you all weekend," Vanessa began, quickly changing the subject, "I think it's time to put a little color and sparkle in your hair."

Michelle and Christian had been friends for a long time. But only friends. Each had on occasion entertained the thought of dating the other, but the timing had never been right. So they were happy at just being friends, and Michelle was quite happy with being Matt's girlfriend.

Michelle knew her friend Christian would forget all else when he was working on one of his inventions. 124.content:
Angela used the key given to her by Christian to enter his house. Before going upstairs to surprise her boyfriend she went to the bathroom and sat on the toilet. Suddenly, Angela began to rapidly shrink in size, her feet quickly left the ground from her shoes, her panties slid off her legs into her pants and she disappeared into the shirt. Before she could realise what’s happening Angela got out of her now massive tent-like shirt, she was now only 3 inches tall and stood completely naked on the toilet seat.

Angela grabbed her head and screamed in panic. The shrunken girl turned her head left and right while hyperventilating.
“HELP! HELP! CHRIS! HELP MEEE!” Her voice was now high-pitched and squeaky so Christian or no one else for that matter, was able to hear Angela’s cries.

Angela got down on her knees, burying her face in her palms and sobbed. After 30 minutes had past the tiny girl raised her head again, she was a bit more calm now and could now attempt to asses this predicament. Angela stood up and looked at the gigantic bathroom, from the toilet seat she got a good view of her surroundings; mundane things like a stool and the bathtub looked like massive alien structures. Despite standing on the toilet seat which gave Angela a major height perspective, the sink still loomed high above her, looking possibly taller than the Empire State Building. After staring in awe at the view Angela turned around and saw her shirt has fallen into the toilet bowl. Normally this would have upset her but right now she had much greater things to worry about.

Angela wanted to get off the toilet but she was too small to jump down to the floor, a drop like that would likely injure her. The tiny naked girl walked around the toilet seat looking for a safer way down until she came across a bide hiding behind the tank, It’s cord stretched down close enough to the ground. There was a big gap between the cord and the toilet seat, so Angela took a deep breath, walked a few steps back, and then sprinted and jumped off the seat straight towards the cord successfully grabbing and clinging on to it.

Angela slowly climbed the down the bide cord until she reached the floor. At ground level the shrunken girl was able to marvel at sheer size of her new environment, it was frightening how minuscule she was compare to everything. She walk around for a bit until suddenly the door swung open, it was...
124.title: Business gets interrupted

1243.content:
Matt was in the neighbourhood so he called Christian asking him if he could swing by his house for a visit. Christian agreed, unbeknownst to him that his girlfriend already planned a surprise visit hoping they could enjoy some privacy together.

Christian kept the shrink ray a secret from Matt, planning to reveal it only when it’s fully functional. So when Matt came they just sat in the living room and had a drink. Eventually Matt had to go to the bathroom.

Angela didn’t trust Matt, despite having a girlfriend there was something creepy about his behaviour. Whenever both couples went on double dates Matt always gazed on her a little too much, which made her feel uncomfortable. Though she was willing to put up with it since he’s Christian’s best friend.

The shrunken girl was terrified to see Matt standing at the door. Not only was his colossal proportions caused a shiver down her spine, but he was the LAST person she wanted to see in this awful predicament. She quickly hid behind the toilet.

As Matt entered the bathroom he was greeted by a horrible smell.
“Ugh... damn...” Matt wrinkled his nose and waved his hand to blow away the air. Seeing the disgusted look on his face, Angela suddenly remembered that she didn’t flush the toilet prior to her shrinking. Her butt also remained unwiped, leaving her tiny, naked and smelly around this creep.

Matt saw Angela’s clothes scattered around the toilet. He was so shocked at that messy sight that he froze for a moment, wondering who would do such a thing. Angela felt so embarrassed she wanted die, but then she realised that this is a good way to distract Matt while she can run away through the open door. The miniature girl had no time to waste so she darted towards the door.

(A few minutes before)

Michelle was feeling a bit upset. She had excited to see her boyfriend today only for him to suddenly cancel their date. Matt had taken a summer job as a cashier at a local restaurant and it kept him busy, too busy sometimes. It felt like he didn’t have much time to see her anymore.

The poor girl had decided to visit Christian. She felt comfortable around him and he was able to make her smile. When she got to his place, she went around to the back door. The back door didn’t need a key, instead, it was a keypad. Christian had taught both her and Matt the code (originally for emergencies).

8425

The door unlocked, allowing her entry. She quietly stepped in, looking around. She had been at his place before, but this was the first time she had entered on her own. She walked into the living room, trying to find him. She soon heard something upstairs and smiled. As she turned towards the stairs, she suddenly felt weird. Michelle sat down, trying to figure out what was happening. Before she could react, a sharp pain shot through her, causing her to scream and pass out.

When she woke up, she felt a bit dizzy. She sat up and rubbed her eyes. Everything was a bit blurry but was clearing up slowly. While she waited for her eyes to adjust, she felt the floor with her hand. It felt soft, but different. As her vision cleared up more, she soon realized she was on a couch, a very familiar couch.

“Wait a minute.” She said softly. She turned towards the edge and stared at the view. Her eyes cleared up completely, allowing her to identify what she was looking at. It was Christian’s living room, only much bigger than before. Michelle looked at herself, trying to understand what happened. “Am I…a doll?” She questioned. As she stood up, she soon heard tremors. The small girl turned towards the source to see…

1251.content:
She looked up to see her friend Christian enter the room. She could tell he was frustrated at something. Michelle started to panic though as she noticed he was coming right towards her. With his current speed, she had no time to move. Her friend moved over to the couch and sat down hard. He ended a bit always from Michelle but the impact of his butt caused her to go flying. The girl landed next to his leg, feeling dizzy.

She looked up and shuddered. Christian was so massive compared to her. His size made her feel a little insignificant right now. With his strength, he could do anything he wanted to her and she wouldn’t be able to fight back.

Meanwhile, Christian was currently unaware of her. He was too frustrated to pay attention. He tried so hard but no matter what, he couldn’t get his invention to work on males. The boy groaned loudly, tilting his head back. After a moment, he took a deep breath and turned on the TV.

“I’ll deal with it later.” He said. Right now, he just needed to get his mind off of the device. He changed the channel until he found his favorite anime. It had a lot of pretty girls in it, but there was one girl who was stunningly beautiful and reminded him a lot of his girlfriend.

Michelle started at the TV, entranced by the show. She had never heard of it before, but it looked interesting. After a few minutes, watched as a cruel girl teased about swallowing a bug. Some of her friends chuckled while others were a little disgusted. As the woman got closer to eating it, her friends begged her not to. She ended up not eating it, but it made Michelle shudder. Although she was a bit bigger than a bug, she wondered if somebody would try to taste her. She really believed Christian wouldn’t, but she wondered if there were others who would.

As Christian was enjoying the show, he started to put his hand down on the couch. He immediately flinched as he felt something. He looked down to see some sort of doll. The boy picked it up (making Michelle nervous) and took a good look at it.

“Hm, where did this come from?” He said softly. Michelle knew she should say something, but being level with his enormous face was really intimidating, causing her to freeze up. “It looks a lot like Michelle, and it’s really cute.” Christian added. He turned her around a little, inspecting her closely.

The girl could feel him checking inside her clothes, like the back of her pants and the inside of her shirt. Michelle knew he didn’t mean any harm, but it still embarrassed her. The giant suddenly smelled her and smiled.

“I’ve never seen a doll this accurate. It’s so nice and lifelike.” After a moment, Christian decided to…

The tiny girl’s eyes widened as she spotted her friend’s mother. The woman was so much bigger than her new size. Michelle also noticed that the giantess seemed to be focused. She watched as the giantess picked things up, making sure everything was clean. The tiny girl realized she needed to move, otherwise her friend’s mother might clean her up too, and not in the good way.

Carrie worked hard, trying to make sure everything was perfect. Her two friends, Cora and Rose, were coming over for a day of fun. The trio liked hanging out together and were like sisters to each other. Carrie knew she didn’t have to prove anything, but she still did her best to prepare everything for them. She had games, tons of snacks, and other things ready to go. She started to clean the couch when she noticed some sort of bug on it.

Michelle started to panic as she tried running towards the edge. She knew she needed to get to the floor but the giantess had spotted her. She screamed as the Titaness brushed her onto the floor. Despite her landing pretty hard, the fall didn’t hurt her too much. She was too focused on Carrie though to care.

Carrie wiped the couch down clean, keeping a mental note of the creepy bug. Once the couch was spotless, the woman turned her attention to the intruder. Although it might have been fun to toy with the creature, Carrie felt she didn’t have time. She lifted her foot up, preparing to crush the insect.

“No, please! Don’t kill me!” Michelle yelled, trembling. The doorbell suddenly rang, startling both of them. As the giant woman was distracted, Michelle took this opportunity to run under the couch.

“Just a second.” Carrie yelled. When she turned back towards her foot, the bug was gone. The woman grumbled but decided not to worry about it. She walked towards the door and opened it up. Her friends greeted her with joy and hugged her. Cora quickly noticed the wash cloth in her hand and giggled.

“Aw honey, did you go overboard with the cleaning again? You know you don’t have to go through all that trouble for us.” Cora said causing Carrie to blush.

“I know, but I want this day to be memorable.” She said. Rose gave her a hug and a kiss on the cheek.

“It will now that we’re here.” Rose said. “Now, let’s go have some fun.”

Michelle could feel the increased trembling and became nervous. She flinched as all three ladies entered the room. Carrie’s friends were quite beautiful and Michelle had heard they could be pretty fun.

“Mm, this place looks great, as always,” Cora complimented. The two giant friends took their shoes and socks off and sat down on the couch. Carrie took her footwear off as well and…

In an instant Carrie found out she was not alone in the house. She also realized this must be the way insects view the world. Because as her now gigantic son stepped out of his bedroom that's what she felt like. An insect.

"Christian!" She said in shock, having to crane he head back to full see his enormous form.

"Hello? " Christian called out as if he'd heard someone outside.

Carrie ran as quickly towards her gigantic son as the carpet allowed. "I'm down here! I shrank! Help me!" She screamed, waving her arms wildly.

1411.title: Christian cane out of his bedroom.

142.content:
Lauren had a wicked hangover. She had gone out the night before and pounded tequila shot after tequila shot with her friends. She was celebrating one of their birthdays and ended up getting drunk enough that she had to sleep on their couch. She had managed to make it home that morning and not vomit. Lauren was looking forward to a quiet day where she could sleep off her bad decisions from the previous night.

Walking into the house, Lauren did bother to announce she was home. She felt her younger brother would give her shit for getting hammered, and wanted to just slip into her room unseen and nap for several hours.

Sneaking into the kitchen, Lauren grabbed a bottle of blue Gatorade from the fridge and rapidly began to chug it. She instantly felt a little more refreshed and set the bottle down on the counter.

Suddenly and without explanation, Lauren found herself getting extremely dizzy. The woman felt like she was falling in the middle of the kitchen. “What the fuck?! Help!” she screamed, trying not to vomit.

When the feeling stopped, Lauren just stood there in awe. She was alone in the kitchen, but she had shrunken down to the size of an ant.

“Wha...what happened to me?” she cried. She looked around and the kitchen was nearly unrecognizable. Crumbs that she normally wouldn’t even notice were now nearly half the size of her body.

“Alright stay calm,” she mumbled to herself. “You can find a way out of this.”

At that moment the floor began to shake. Lauren looked up in fear as a massive person began to enter the kitchen. “Holy shit,” she whispered to herself.

A bare foot slammed down right in front of Lauren; knocking her on her ass. “Oh my god, help!” she screamed.

Who was the giant towering over the ant sized Lauren?
142.title: Lauren the ant

choices: Looks down and sees a bug
1423.content:
Lauren craned her head back. The giant foot in front of her had five toes, all coated in a bright red nail polish. This had to mean the giant woman towering over here was....

“Mom,” she whispered. She could not believe how insignificant she was to this massive woman. She also didn’t know what her mom was doing home so early on a work day.

Carrie was exhausted. She had not slept well the night before, and was feeling very nauseous. While her daughter felt sick as a result of her poor decisions the night before, Carrie was coming down with a cold. She poured herself a glass of ginger ale while standing in the kitchen and slowly began to sip it. She was irritated that she had to take half a sick day, but it was probably best not to contaminate all her coworkers.

As she stood there, sipping her beverage, the giant woman scrunched her toes. She had no idea that she nearly stepped on her oldest daughter. Lauren was terrified at the thought of being crushed under her mother’s giant toes, but she knew she needed to get help.

“Fuck it, I can do this,” the hungover tiny mumbled, and ran up to her moms foot. Lauren walked over to her moms smallest toe and began to hoist herself up.

Feeling a minor irritation on her foot, what does Carrie do?

154.content:
Angela Staninski has just finished a brutal morning of studying for her nursing exams. Despite the fact that most students were on summer break, such a thing did not exist for those in nursing school. Her schedule was brutal, but one thing that always got her through was spending time with her beloved boyfriend, Christian. Angela was quite the shy girl, and did not have many friends. She was also incredibly shy around Christians family, and was unsure of how they felt about her. She knew Christians mother did like her and wanted to establish a good relationship between the two. As far as his older sister, Lauren, she wasn’t entirely sure. Yeah, they were polite towards each other, but Angela had turned down Lauren’s invites to go out together several times, and was unsure of how she took them.

Today, Angela thought it would be a great idea to surprise Christian. She figured he would probably be home alone, and knew that the family kept their back door unlocked.

As Angela slipped into the house, she began to creep up the stairs to Christians room. For some treason, she began to feel very sick and light headed. Angela’s vision got blurry and she began to feel like she was falling.

This peculiar feeling only lasted a couple of seconds. However, Angela was in for a terrifying surprise when she came back to reality.

Angela was just outside of Christian's massive room, and finally thought of something to break through her speechlessness. "Wha...what the hell just happened!" she cried. She felt truly insignificant. She was a speck-sized woman in the massive expanse that was her boyfriend's house.

Knowing her best option was to get her giant boyfriend's attention, Angela began to run to his door. She was definitely small enough to slip through the crack underneath it. As Angela began to approach, what happened?

1541.content:
Angela continues to ru towards the massive wooden door of her boyfriend. Despite her body growing tired, she knew she couldn’t stop until she was out of the potentially dangerous hallway.

The speck sized woman finally walked underneath the giant door, as she was so tiny that she didn’t need to crawl, and entered the vast expanse of Christian’s room. Being only one millimeter tall, the room seemed to stretch for miles around her. Her eyes focused in on her now godlike boyfriend.

Christian sat on his bed and continued to mess with his shrink ray. He was baffled as to why it seemed to be malfunctioning today. He never had problems with this before. He was also particularly annoyed because he wanted to show Angela exactly what this could do, but now it seemed like he wouldn’t have the chance.

Meanwhile, his shrunken lover was pushing her way through the carpeting in a desperate attempt to reach his bed. After about a half hour, the exhausted woman had finally reached the foot of her boyfriends massive bed.

Angela was in awe at her boyfriends giant bare foot rested on the floor. Approaching the massive mound of flesh, she shuttered to think what would happen if it stepped on her. It emmitted a pungent odor which would’ve been unpleasant at normal size but was absolutely nauseating now. “Alright Christian, please notice me,” the tiny girl whimpered she then walked over to his little toe and struggled in the long process of pulling herself up.

Did he see anything?

Desperate to reach the possible sanctuary that was her boyfriends room, Angela thought she was about to reach safety. She was in for a rude awakening, when a catastrophic BOOM erupted right next to her. The one millimeter girl fell to the ground and looked over in horror. info.brief_description: A college-aged genius invents a shrink ray, the only problem is it only affects women....
info.description:
This story occurs when Christian Hanson successfully invents a shrink ray. One peculiar part of the shrink ray is it only effects women due to the Y-Chromosome protecting against size manipulation. This shouldn't be a problem as Christian is testing the shrink ray at in his room. He thinks he's home alone, not realizing someone just entered the house.

The characters of the family include:

Christian Hanson - age 21, a senior in college studying physics. He's home for the summer and is working on an invention he plans to be a shrink ray. He's aware that it only affects women. He enjoys having a beer and hanging out with his buddies, but also loves his family and his girlfriend.

Carrie Hanson - age 48, a secretary at a major law firm. She's the matriarch of the family and the mother of Christian and his two sisters, and is also married to Mark. She loves her family and enjoys having her girlfriends over for drinks.
https://www.deviantart.com/tpbeech/art/Carrie-Hanson-815055841

Lauren Hanson - age 24, a college graduate his is currently in law school. She is Christian's older sister who enjoys partying and getting hammered with her friends, as well teasing her younger brother for every reason she finds.
https://www.deviantart.com/tpbeech/art/Lauren-Hanson-826082264

Julia Hanson - age 18, a senior in high school his is currently indecisive about her future. Julia is both very smart and very athletic, and she loves giving her older siblings a hard time.
https://www.deviantart.com/tpbeech/art/Julia-Hanson-815054026

Angela Staninski - age 22, Christian's girlfriend who is a year older than him and in nursing school. She loves her boyfriend but is relatively shy around his family. Angela doesn't have many friends and keeps to herself.
https://www.deviantart.com/tpbeech/art/Angela-Staninski-826082461

Michelle Lopez - age 22, the girlfriend of Christian's best friend Matt. Michelle is a waitress at a local bar, and Christian introduced her and Matt together. Christian and Michelle are very good friends, and Michelle is a social butterfly who will hang out with anyone.
https://www.deviantart.com/tpbeech/art/Michelle-Lopez-826082774

Mark Hanson - age 47, Carrie's husband and the father of Lauren, Christian and Julia. Mark is a lawyer at the firm Carrie works at. He doesn't care for bugs and is often easily stressed out.

Matt Welch - age 22, the best friend of Christian and the boyfriend of Michelle. He's a good guy but he also is attracted to both Lauren and Angela.


Once a woman is shrunken, anyone is able to interact with her.

Both aware and unaware are allowed.

I'll do my best to forward any storylines that are added to.

Anything is allowed, but please refrain from choice chapters that are one sentences.
